name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sidebar Bookmarks - Privacy Bookmarks, bookmark sync
name.zh_CN: 侧边书签栏 - 隐私书签、书签加密同步

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Includes features such as private bookmarks, import and export, encrypted synchronization and more.
short.zh_CN: 包含隐私书签、隐私书签导入导出、隐私书签加密同步、清除浏览记录、置顶书签、最近访问、最常访问、最近添加和搜索等功能。无论工作或娱乐，都将保护隐私，提升浏览体验，节省宝贵时间。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The sidebar bookmark plugin offers the following features:

🆕 Privacy bookmarks support folder management

⭐️ Browser bookmark encryption synchronization: Support cross-browser encryption synchronization of bookmarks to protect information security.

⭐️ Convenient Sidebar: Easily access and manage your bookmarks for a more efficient browsing experience.

⭐️ Privacy Bookmark Feature: Hide sensitive bookmarks to ensure your browsing privacy, displaying them only when needed to protect personal information.

⭐️ Import/Export Privacy Bookmarks: Conveniently manage your bookmarks by easily importing or exporting privacy bookmarks, giving you complete control over your data.

⭐️ Encrypted Synchronization of Privacy Bookmarks: Securely sync privacy bookmarks across different devices, allowing you to access your bookmark library anytime without worrying about privacy leaks.

⭐️ Pinned Bookmarks: Quickly access frequently used webpages with the pinned bookmarks feature, ensuring you can always find your favorite sites.

⭐️ Recently Visited: Easily view webpages you’ve recently visited for quick returns.

⭐️ Most Visited: Automatically records the websites you visit most often, helping you quickly find commonly used resources.

⭐️ Recently Added: Conveniently view newly added bookmarks for quick organization and management.

⭐️ Search Function: Quickly find bookmarks using keywords, enhancing search efficiency.

By installing this plugin, you will be able to quickly find the webpages you need, enhancing your browsing experience and saving time. Whether for work or leisure, your browsing will become smoother and more efficient.

Two ways to open the extension sidebar:
1. Click the extension icon. You need to "pin" the extension to the browser toolbar.
2. Use the shortcut key. You can set the shortcut key by yourself chrome://extensions/shortcuts，Default is "Alt+B".
long.zh_CN:
侧边书签栏插件提供以下功能：

🆕 隐私书签支持文件夹管理

⭐️ 浏览器书签加密同步：支持跨浏览器加密同步书签，保护信息安全。

⭐️ 便捷的侧边栏：轻松访问和管理您的书签，让浏览更高效。

⭐️ 隐私书签功能：隐藏敏感书签，确保您的浏览隐私，仅在需要时展示，保护个人信息安全。

⭐️ 隐私书签导入导出：方便地管理您的书签，轻松将隐私书签导入或导出，保障您对数据的完全掌控。

⭐️ 隐私书签加密同步：在不同设备间安全同步隐私书签，随时随地访问您的书签库，无需担心隐私泄露。

⭐️ 置顶书签：快速访问常用网页，通过置顶书签功能，随时找到您最喜欢的网站。

⭐️ 最近访问：轻松查看您最近访问过的网页，快速返回。

⭐️ 最常访问：自动记录您最常访问的网站，助您快速找到常用资源。

⭐️ 最近添加：方便查看新添加的书签，快速组织和管理。

⭐️ 搜索功能：通过关键词快速查找书签，提高查找效率。

安装这款插件后，您将能快速找到所需网页，提升浏览体验，节省时间。无论是工作还是娱乐，浏览都将更加流畅高效。

打开扩展侧边栏的两种方法：
1. 点击扩展图标。您需要将扩展“固定”到浏览器工具栏上。
2. 使用快捷键。快捷键可以自行设置 chrome://extensions/shortcuts，默认 "Alt+B"。
